problem_text:
Is it true that a countable topological group of exponent 2 with unique free ultrafilter converging to the identity has a basis of neighborhoods of the identity consisting of subgroups?
E. G. Zelenyuk, I. V. Protasov
answer: Assuming Martin’s Axiom, the answer is “No” (Ye. Zelenyuk, Adv. Math., 229, no. 4 (2012), 2415–2426).
